name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Removes all <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> consumption for 10 seconds after drinking the flask. Allows you to perform actions that exceed your available <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> until the effect ends.

name: Viridian Hidden Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Removes all <font color="#E0B985">stamina</font> consumption for 15 seconds after drinking the flask.

name: Crimsonburst Dried Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Creates a radiant aura for 180 seconds that restores <font color="#E0B985">HP</font> of nearby allies by 7 per second. Affects allied players, friendly NPCs, and Spirit Ashes only, and the aura emits a faint guiding light.

name: Crimson-Sapping Cracked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 0.75% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> each time an attack lands for 45 seconds.

The healing amount per hit is unaffected by damage dealt, enemy count, or attack type.

name: Cerulean-Sapping Cracked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Restores 5 <font color="#E0B985">FP</font> per hit from melee attacks for 45 seconds.

Only attacks that count as weapon strikes, such as Carian Slicer, trigger the restoration; spell projectiles do not.

name: Oil-Soaked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Causes oil to drip from your body for 30 seconds, soaking nearby enemies you brush against. Oil-soaked targets take 20% increased <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> and this effect does not stack with Oil Pots or Hefty Oil Pots.

name: Bloodsucking Cracked Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases all <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> by 20% for 3 minutes (12.5% in PvP) while draining 0.2% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 20 <font color="#E0B985">HP</font> every second.

name: Glovewort Crystal Tear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Increases Spirit Ash and other summoned ally <font color="#E0B985">attack power</font> by 7.5% for 3 minutes.

name: Deflecting Hardtear
caption: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages, where the scattered sap of the Scadutree pools deep within the furnace golems.
info:
Needs to be mixed in the Flask of Wondrous Physick to use.

Enhances spontaneous guards for 5 minutes, granting 100% <font color="#F395C4">physical damage negation</font>, 75% <font color="#E0B985">elemental damage negation</font>, and increased <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> whenever you deflect at the moment of impact. Each successful spontaneous guard adds a stack that increases <font color="#F395C4">guard counter damage</font> and <font color="#C0B194">stance damage</font> by 20% for roughly 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times (80%), with heavier stance-breaking attacks granting 2 stacks at once. Only true spontaneous guards trigger these bonuses, and they also nullify any status buildup that the deflected strike would have inflicted.
